summary: Premium section, local premium state (localStorage), and step gating were added. However, some REQ-11 button text/visibility details do not exactly match the BuildRequest wording (unlock button label differs; donation button label changes when premium is unlocked).

missing_requirements.requirement: Premium section must include a button labeled exactly “Unlock Premium AI Step Solver (₹50)” opening the provided UPI deep link.
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented unlock button text is “Unlock Premium (₹50)”, not the exact required label.

missing_requirements.requirement: Premium section must include a button labeled exactly “Donate via UPI” opening the provided donation UPI deep link.
missing_requirements.reason: When premium is unlocked, the donation button label changes to “Support via Donation” instead of “Donate via UPI”.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a development/testing-only API to reset premium status (resetPremium).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any reset/development control for premium unlock state.
